headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Allstate (ALL) After Strong Five Year Share Price Gains
summary: If you are wondering whether Allstate's current share price lines up with its underlying value, you are not alone. This article walks through what the numbers may be signaling. Allstate's stock recently closed at US$212.21, with returns of 4.1% over the last week, 5.5% over the past month, 4.1% year to date, 19.6% over one year, 63.8% over three years, and 121.4% over five years. This has many investors asking what is already priced in. Recent news around Allstate has focused on the broader...
